name: barbarilem
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: mp2(wex(s0, wa(w0, w1)), wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wex(s0, w0))

body.origin:
|- wex(s0, wa(w0, w1))
-| wal(s0, wi(w0, w1))
-| wex(s0, w0)
-| wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wex(s0, w0), wex(s0, wa(w0, w1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wex(s0, wa(w0, w1))
-| wal(s0, wi(w0, w1))
-| wex(s0, w0)
-| wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wex(s0, w0), wex(s0, wa(w0, w1))))

body.origin: |- wi(wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wex(s0, w0), wex(s0, wa(w0, w1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wex(s0, wa(w0, w1))
-| wal(s0, wi(w0, w1))
-| wex(s0, w0)

comment: Lemma for ~ barbari and the other Aristotelian syllogisms with existential assumption. (Contributed by BJ, 16-Sep-2022.)
